TopBar.address: Jl. Kilisuci no 71, Singonegaran, Kediri City.

CompanyProfile.title: Since 1983: A Legacy of Trust and Unmatched Quality
CompanyProfile.description: Dallas Offset Printing is a pioneer and leader in the offset printing industry in Kediri, with an unbroken track record since its establishment in 1983. With over four decades of rich experience, we have mastered the art and technology of printing, always prioritizing high quality to meet and exceed the specific needs of every customer. Our commitment is proven by our service to tens of thousands of clients from various industrial scales, affirming the consistency and reliability of our printing results.

AboutUs.title: Modern Technology for Precise Results
AboutUs.description: We use the latest offset machines to ensure detail sharpness and color consistency on every sheet. Supported by a team of expert operators, Dallas Printing is ready to handle your various printing needs quickly, neatly, and efficiently.

WhyChoose.title: Why Choose Dallas Offset Printing?
WhyChoose.subtitle: Dedication to Quality and Punctuality Since 1983.

experience.title: 4 Decades of Experience
experience.desc: Over 40 years of work gives us deep expertise to handle the various complexities of your printing projects, from small scale to mass production.

quality.title: Precision Quality Standards
quality.desc: We combine the precision of experienced operators with the latest machine technology to ensure accurate colors, neat cuts, and consistent results.

consultation.title: Solution-Oriented Consultation Partner
consultation.desc: We are more than just printers. Our team is ready to provide expert advice on material selection, cost efficiency, to the best finishing for your product.

punctuality.title: Punctuality Guarantee
punctuality.desc: We value your business by valuing your time. With structured workflow management, we are committed to completing orders according to the agreed deadline.

WhyChoose.cta: Entrust your business image to the experts. Contact Dallas Offset Printing today for your project consultation.

PremiumQuality.title: Premium Quality
PremiumQuality.description: Discover our exceptional range of cigarette and non-cigarette products

FeaturedProducts.title: Our Featured Products
FeaturedProducts.subtitle: Find various high-quality printing solutions for your business needs.

artPaper.name: ART PAPER
artPaper.desc: This paper has a smooth and glossy surface, so the print results are sharp and brightly colored.

ivoryPaper.name: IVORY PAPER
ivoryPaper.desc: A type of glossy/doff packaging paper that combines art carton and matte paper, elegant yet strong.

tipping.name: Tipping
tipping.desc: Special tipping paper for cigarette filters, often used for branding with logo prints or lines.

duplex.name: Duplex
duplex.desc: Recycled cardboard paper layered with white liner, with one white side and one gray side.

NonCigarette.title: Quality Packaging Solutions Since 2022
NonCigarette.description: Paperlisens understands that packaging is the face of your culinary brand. Since 2022, we have been dedicated to providing the best papertrays and takeaway boxes through easy and fast online services. The trust of thousands of customers in various marketplaces proves our commitment to helping your business look more professional.

card1.title: Versatile & Trendy Cup Solutions
card1.desc: Not just a container, but a stage for your culinary delights. From Cup Toast for grilled bread to various cup variants (Type A, B, Sakura, and Ice) designed with precision. This aesthetic tray shape is perfect for serving various finger foods, fried foods, or contemporary snacks to make them look fuller, attractive, and certainly Instagramable.

card2.title: Donut Boxes in Various Sizes
card2.desc: Whatever your selling portion needs, we have the box! Available from personal sizes (contents 1 & 2) to family or hamper sizes (contents 3 & 6). Designed with sturdy material to keep the donut shape perfect and beautiful until it reaches the customer's hands.

hampers.title: Hampers Box
hampers.desc: Premium printed packaging with precise details, stunning colors, and elegant finishing.

bakery.title: Bakery Box
bakery.desc: Elegant and functional packaging to protect and beautify your bakery products.

rokok.title: Cigarette Box
rokok.desc: Printed cigarette boxes with sharp graphic details and high-quality materials.

nasi.title: Rice Box
nasi.desc: Practical and hygienic rice boxes for various events and catering needs.

buku.title: Books
buku.desc: Clear text, sharp images, strong binding for the best reading experience.

kalender.title: Calendar
kalender.desc: Attractive design and best materials, functional promotional tool.

paperbag.title: Paperbag
paperbag.desc: Strong, stylish paperbags that reflect brand identity.

map.title: Folder
map.desc: Custom printed folders for office needs, seminars, or events. Professional and functional.

brosur.title: Brochure
brosur.desc: Clear information, stunning images, and precise folding.
